DOC.brief_title: Ovarian Response Prediction In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Assisted reproduction in-vitro fertilisation play pivotal role treatment infertility , understand reproductive biology , future population dynamic . The success assist reproductive technology ( ART ) critically dependent optimize protocol control ovarian stimulation aim provide adequate number good quality oocytes in-vitro laboratory procedure . Interindividual variation response follicle-stimulating hormone ( FSH ) widespread problem clinical economical implication . A group patient ( 9 % -24 % ) tend respond poorly control ovarian stimulation ( COS ) whereas patient tend overrespond ( 2.5 % ) thus run risk develop ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome , potentially life-threatening disease . Polymorphisms gonadotropin receptor seem influence outcome control ovarian hyperstimulation treatment , e.g . contribute variation ovarian response exogenous FSH individual . Other predictive factor include demographic ( age ) , sonographic ( follicular count ovary , ovarian volume ) , endocrine ( serum gonadotropin level Anti-Muellerian Hormone ) life-style factor ( smoking , obesity ) . Such factor routinely obtain prior treatment cycle , use determine optimal FSH start dose best treatment regimen . The identification gonadotropin receptor polymorphisms variant secrete gonadotropin prior ovarian stimulation treatment allow clinician tailor start dose rFSH , especially patient undergo first treatment cycle , ovarian response prediction prevent cycle cancellation due low high ovarian response reduce risk OHSS . The aim present study identify prevalence FSH LH receptor polymorphisms hormonal variant LH study variation attributable genetics factor control already establish predictor ovarian response exogenous FSH multi-variate analysis .
